tool.name: Cp2kRun
tool.description: : Wrapper of the CP2K QM tool module.

param.name: input_inp_path
param.label: input INP,IN,TXT,WFN file
param.help: Input configuration file (CP2K run options). Format: [input].[format]

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: CP2K binary path to be used.

param.name: param_path
param.label: param_path
param.help: Path to the CP2K parameter data files (BASIS_SET, POTENTIALS, etc.). If not provided, the parameter data files included in the package will be used.

param.name: mpi_bin
param.label: mpi_bin
param.help: Path to the MPI runner. Usually "mpirun" or "srun".

param.name: mpi_np
param.label: mpi_np
param.help: Number of MPI processes. Usually an integer bigger than 1.

param.name: mpi_flags
param.label: mpi_flags
param.help: Path to the MPI hostlist file.
